QID10.description:
And finally, we’d like to understand how you feel about managing your money. 
Below are some statements people have made about their attitudes to their finances. How much do you agree or disagree with each statement?

choices.5: I am knowledgeable about how to manage my money/ finances

choices.6: I am very happy to take calculated risks with my money (i.e. in investments)

choices.8: I would love more support to learn about managing my finances

choices.10: I often spend more money than I plan to/ budget for

choices.11: I regularly need to use my overdraft/ borrow money at the end of the month

choices.12: I sometimes waste money and make poor purchase decisions

choices.14: I like to research different financial providers/ services/ products to find the best one for me

choices.15: Having all of my finances with one bank is important to me

QID4.description: Do you deposit your salary into your N26 account?

choices.1: Yes, my employer pays it in directly

choices.2: Yes, I transfer all of it in from another account

choices.3: Yes, I deposit it as cash after I’m paid

choices.4: No, most of my salary is kept somewhere else

QID15.description: Do you have any additional feedback or comments?

QID1.description: How likely is it that you would recommend N26 to a friend or colleague?

QID12.description: How would you rate N26 when you did each of these?

choices.12: Automatic round-ups of card purchases for easier saving

QID13.description: How would you rate N26 when you did each of these?

choices.4: Transferred money to/from other N26 customers with MoneyBeam

choices.5: Sent money in a foreign currency via our TransferWise feature

choices.6: Sent money to another account via bank transfer

choices.7: Added money to your account via bank transfer or from another card

choices.8: Deposited cash into your N26 account at a store (CASH26)

choices.10: Visited our help pages on our website

choices.12: Moved an account to N26 with our account switching service

QID19.description: How would you rate your current membership/plan?

QID21.description: How would you rate your current membership/plan?

QID22.description: How would you rate your current membership/plan?

QID23.description: How would you rate your current membership/plan?

QID16.description: What is your primary reason for not depositing your salary in N26?

QID2.description: What one thing would you most like us to improve at N26?

QID17.description:
What one thing would you most like us to improve at N26?
(you can select more than one answer)

QID3.description: Which of the following best describes what you use your N26 account for?

choices.1: It’s the main account that I use for almost all of my banking and spending

choices.2: An additional account that I use for just my day-to-day spending, or bill paying

choices.3: An additional account that I use when traveling

choices.4: An additional account used mostly online (so I don’t have to enter my other main account’s details on the internet)

QID6.description: Which of the following features do you use?

choices.35: Automatic round-ups of card purchases for easier saving

QID8.description: Which of the following have you done with N26?

choices.4: Transferred money to/from other N26 customers with MoneyBeam

choices.5: Sent money in a foreign currency via our TransferWise feature

choices.6: Sent money to another account via bank transfer

choices.7: Added money to your account via bank transfer or from another card

choices.8: Deposited cash into your N26 account at a store (CASH26)

choices.10: Visited our help pages on our website

choices.12: Moved an account to N26 with our account switching service
